Translations.Text: (Vos commemorate DEUS ut numerus de feria Mena;) whoever hastens perfecit hoc in 2 feria non commits sin whoever stays longer commits sin long prout righteousness maintained Vos observe DEUS know ut Eum vos gathered
Among the people 1 impress vos his utterances hoc vita et alias DEUS testis his innermost thoughts dum he est ardent opponent
Prout soon prout he sinister he roams terra corruptingly destroying properties vita. DEUS NON love corruption
When he told Observe DEUS he becomes arrogantly indignant. Consequently his unus destiny est Hell; quod miserable abode
Tunc ibi est those dedicate their vita serving DEUS; DEUS est compassionate towards such worshipers
O vos believe vos embrace total submission; non subsequentis steps Satan he est tuus ardent enemy
Vos backslide clear proofs advenit vos tunc know ut DEUS est Almighty Wise
they waiting DEUS est advenit them dense clouds unus angels? When hoc happens whole matter terminated DEUS everything returned
